net.jforum.sso

Interface LoginAuthenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLoginAuthenticator, LDAPAuthenticator

    public interface LoginAuthenticator
    Validates user's credentials. Implementations of this interface are supposed to check for access rights in some "shared" environment, like calling some external procedure, consulting a different users table, reading from a XML file etc.. It is not SSO, since it still will be JForum that will call the validate login methods.
    If you want SSO, please check SSO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil
